atmega328p_au.ipc610_notes: TQFP-32, 0.8mm pitch. Standard reflow profile. No special handling.

control.name: RESET
control.note: PC6. Active low. Connect to ISP header.

pins.notes: 5V MCU. TQFP-32 pinout (different from DIP-28). Use 74AHCT125 level shifter for 3.3V peripherals.

esp32_wroom_32.ipc610_notes: Antenna must overhang board edge or face clearance zone. Ground pad requires sufficient thermal relief.

control.name: EN
control.note: Enable pin. RC delay for stable boot.

control.name: IO0
control.note: BOOT pin. Low = download mode. Must be high for normal run.

control.name: IO2
control.note: Must be low during boot for some flash types

adc_channels.note: ADC2 channels (GPIO0,2,4,12-15,25-27) unavailable when WiFi active. Use ADC1 only.

pwm_pins: Any GPIO via LEDC (up to 16 channels)
pins.notes: Default I2C on GPIO21/22. Default VSPI on GPIO18/19/23/5. UART2 on GPIO16/17 for peripherals. GPIO34-39 are input-only (no pull-ups).

rp2040.ipc610_notes: QFN-56, 0.4mm pitch. Requires stencil for paste. Exposed pad needs thermal vias to inner ground plane.

control.name: RUN
control.note: Active high reset. Ground to reset.

adc_channels.note: 3 external ADC channels + internal temperature sensor

pwm_pins: All GPIOs have PWM via 8 PWM slices (16 channels)
gpio_available: GP0-GP28 (29 GPIOs, all flexible via PIO)
pins.notes: All GPIOs are flexible via PIO. Any GPIO can be any interface. Defaults shown are conventional. 12MHz crystal required. Needs external flash (W25Q32JV).

nrf52840_qiaa.ipc610_notes: aQFN-73 package. Requires precision stencil. Antenna matching network critical — follow Nordic reference design.

power.name: VDDH
power.note: High voltage supply for USB, NFC

pwm_pins: Any GPIO via 4 PWM instances (up to 16 channels)
pins.notes: QFN-48 variant (QIAA). All GPIOs flexible via PSEL registers. 32MHz + 32.768kHz crystals both required. NFC pins configurable as GPIO via UICR.

stm32h743vit6.ipc610_notes: LQFP-100, 0.5mm pitch. Multiple power domains — each VDD pin needs dedicated decoupling. Follow ST reference design for power filtering.

control.name: BOOT0
control.note: Low = boot from flash. High = system bootloader.

adc_channels.note: 3x 16-bit ADC, up to 20 channels. PA0-PA7, PB0-PB1, PC0-PC5 available as ADC inputs.

pwm_pins: Multiple timers — TIM1-TIM17 with various channel outputs
pins.notes: Complex pin muxing — use STM32CubeMX to validate pin assignments. DCMI and ETH_RMII share some pins — cannot use simultaneously. 25MHz + 32.768kHz crystals required.

required_output_cap.notes: Required for stability. Ceramic OK if X5R/X7R.

ams1117_3v3.ipc610_notes: SOT-223 tab is output pin — ensure wide trace to tab pad for thermal dissipation. Max dropout 1.3V at full load.

power_source.notes: Efficiency = 3.3/Vin. At 5V: 66%. At 12V: 27.5%. RESOLVER CHECK: if Vin > 7V AND Iload > 150mA → thermal limit exceeded, insert buck pre-regulator.

output.note: Tab is also VOUT — connect to output copper pour for heatsinking

pins.notes: Tab is VOUT — use wide copper pour for thermal dissipation. 10µF tantalum on input + output recommended.

ams1117_3v3.substitution_notes: Specific part required — do not substitute.

tp4056.ipc610_notes: SOP-8. Prog resistor sets charge current (2k = 580mA, 1.2k = 1A). Keep thermal pad connected to copper pour.
safety_warnings: LiPo batteries are a fire risk if mishandled
Maximum input voltage 8V — use overvoltage clamp on USB-C VBUS (auto-added)
RPROG resistor MUST be populated (auto-added) — undefined charge current without it
Do not charge below 0°C — risk of lithium plating and cell failure
Battery protection IC (DW01A) recommended for bare cells (auto-added)
Simultaneous charge + heavy load (>300mA) may cause thermal shutdown
TP4056 gets hot during fast charge — ensure adequate PCB copper for heat dissipation

power_source.notes: System load adds to charge demand. Warn if total system draw > 300mA on battery designs.

output.note: Battery connection — connect to LiPo via DW01A protection

control.name: CHRG
control.note: Charging indicator — active low, drives LED

control.name: STDBY
control.note: Charge complete — active low, drives LED

control.name: TEMP
control.note: NTC thermistor input. 10k to GND if no NTC used.

control.name: CE
control.note: Chip enable. HIGH=normal operation, LOW=shutdown (35µA quiescent).

pins.notes: PROG pin mandatory — sets charge current. CHRG/STDBY drive LEDs directly (active low, ~5mA sink).

tp4056.substitution_notes: Specific part required — do not substitute.

tps63001.ipc610_notes: SON-10 with exposed pad. Inductor placement critical — 2.2uH inductor within 5mm. Follow TI reference layout.
tps63001.user_cable_note: On-board voltage regulator. For AA battery input: connect 2xAA or 3xAA battery holder via JST-PH 2-pin connector. For solar: connect 5-6V panel via JST-PH 2-pin.

power_source.notes: Best for battery designs. 90% vs 66% LDO. Handles full LiPo range. 50µA quiescent in power-save.

control.name: EN
control.note: Enable — HIGH to run. Low = shutdown (<1µA).

control.name: PS/SYNC
control.note: Power save mode select. Float or HIGH = power save. Low = forced PWM.

control.name: FB
control.note: Feedback pin — connect to VOUT via resistor divider for adjustable output. Tie to VOUT for fixed 3.3V.

pins.notes: Buck-boost — maintains 3.3V from 1.8V to 5.5V input. Fixed 3.3V output (no PG pin). Inductor (2.2µH) between L1(pin14) and L2(pin4).

tps63001.substitution_notes: Specific part required — do not substitute.

usb_c_connector.ipc610_notes: USB-C receptacle. Must be placed at board edge. ESD protection TVS diodes recommended on D+/D- lines.
safety_warnings: CC1 and CC2 MUST have 5.1k pull-down resistors (auto-added) — board will not receive power without them
Never connect VBUS directly to battery — always through charge controller
USB-C cables can deliver up to 100W (20V/5A) from PD sources — overvoltage protection critical

pins.notes: USB 2.0 device: connect VBUS, GND, D+, D-, CC1, CC2. CC pins need 5.1k pull-downs (auto-added).

usb_c_connector.auto_add_note: USB-C needs: 2× 5.1kΩ CC pull-downs, ESD (USBLC6), VBUS cap, ferrite bead, optional CMC.

dc_barrel_jack.ipc610_notes: Through-hole barrel jack. Must be placed at board edge. Solder joints need adequate fillets for mechanical strength.
dc_barrel_jack.user_cable_note: 5.5x2.1mm barrel plug DC adapter (user provides). Check voltage/polarity.
safety_warnings: Reverse polarity protection required (auto-added Schottky diode)
Overcurrent fuse required (auto-added PTC 2A)
Verify wall adapter voltage matches board design — mismatched adapter can damage board

terminals.name: SWITCH
terminals.note: NC contact — opens when jack inserted. Can detect power presence.

pins.notes: Centre-positive convention. Pin 3 is normally-closed switch contact to ring.

dc_barrel_jack.auto_add_note: P-FET reverse polarity protection auto-added (DMG2305UX + 10kΩ gate pulldown).

dht22.ipc610_notes: Through-hole, single-wire digital interface. Needs 4.7k pull-up on data line. Keep away from heat sources.
dht22.user_cable_note: On-board component. Soldered directly to PCB. No external cable needed.

connection_hints.notes: Single-wire protocol (not 1-Wire). 4.7k pull-up on data pin.

GPIO.note: Single-wire protocol. Pull up 10k to VCC. Connect to any GPIO.

pins.notes: Single-wire protocol — not I2C. 10k pull-up required on DATA line.

si7021.ipc610_notes: DFN-6. I2C address fixed at 0x40. Sensor opening must not be covered by conformal coating.
si7021.user_cable_note: On-board component. Soldered directly to PCB. No external cable needed.

connection_hints.notes: Fixed address — only one per bus.

I2C.note: Fixed address — only one per bus

pins.notes: Fixed I2C address 0x40. 3.3V only.

mpu6050.ipc610_notes: QFN-24. Mount on rigid PCB area. Keep away from motors and speakers (vibration). I2C addr configurable via AD0.
mpu6050.user_cable_note: On-board component. Soldered directly to PCB. No external cable needed.

connection_hints.notes: AD0 low=0x68, high=0x69. INT pin for motion wake.

power.name: VLOGIC
power.note: I/O voltage reference. Can be different from VDD.

interrupt.note: Active low, open-drain. Pull up 10k to VDD.

control.name: AD0
control.note: Low=0x68, High=0x69. Allows 2 on same bus.

pins.notes: AD0 pin selects address: GND=0x68, VDD=0x69. INT pin for motion detect wake.

vl53l0x.ipc610_notes: LGA-12 optical sensor. Emitter/detector windows must face outward. Cross-talk cover gasket recommended. I2C default 0x29.
vl53l0x.user_cable_note: On-board component. Soldered directly to PCB. No external cable needed.

connection_hints.notes: XSHUT for multi-sensor address reassignment. GPIO1 for data-ready interrupt.

control.name: XSHUT
control.note: Active low shutdown. Pull low to disable, release to enable.

pins.notes: 2.8V supply — needs separate regulator or voltage divider from 3.3V. XSHUT allows multiple sensors via address reassignment.

bh1750fvi.ipc610_notes: WSOF-6, optical window must not be covered. I2C address selectable (0x23 or 0x5C via ADDR pin).

connection_hints.notes: ADDR low=0x23, high=0x5C.

pins.notes: Pin 5 (DVI) is NC — do not connect. ADDR pin selects I2C address.

bme680.ipc610_notes: LGA-8. Gas sensor port must not be blocked. Keep away from VOC sources on PCB (flux residue). Allow airflow.
bme680.user_cable_note: On-board component. Soldered directly to PCB. No external cable needed.

connection_hints.notes: SDO low=0x76, high=0x77. Also supports SPI.

SPI.note: SPI mode when CSB pulled low

control.name: SDO
control.note: I2C: GND=0x76, VDD=0x77. SPI: this is MISO output.

pins.notes: Pin 2 (CSB): HIGH=I2C mode, LOW=SPI mode. SDO pin 5 sets I2C address or acts as SPI MISO.

bmp280.ipc610_notes: LGA-8. Pressure port hole must remain open. I2C address selectable (0x76 or 0x77 via SDO pin).
bmp280.user_cable_note: On-board component. Soldered directly to PCB. No external cable needed.

connection_hints.notes: Same address as BME680 — cannot coexist on same bus without address change.

pins.notes: Pin-compatible with BME680/BME280. Pin 2 (CSB): HIGH=I2C, LOW=SPI. I2C default 0x76.

neo6m.ipc610_notes: RF module. Ground plane under module critical. Keep copper pour clear above antenna area.

connection_hints.notes: UART at 9600 baud default. PPS = 1 pulse per second for timing sync.

pins.notes: UART only at module level. Internal GPS IC has I2C but module only exposes UART + PPS.

rfm95w.ipc610_notes: RF module — requires SMA antenna connector. Antenna port at board edge. 50 ohm impedance matching. Ground plane mandatory.

connection_hints.notes: SPI + DIO0 (TX done/RX ready) + RST. DIO0 interrupt is essential for packet handling.

control.name: DIO0
control.note: Interrupt — TX done / RX done. Connect to MCU GPIO with interrupt.

control.name: ANT
control.note: RF output to antenna via impedance-matched trace or U.FL

pins.notes: SPI interface. DIO0 interrupt is essential for TX/RX operation. 50Ω antenna trace or U.FL connector.

w5500.ipc610_notes: LQFP-48. Requires HR911105A magnetics+RJ45. Crystal 25MHz within 10mm. Follow WIZnet reference layout.

connection_hints.notes: SPI + INT + RST. High SPI clock (up to 80MHz).

control.name: RSTn
control.note: Active low reset. RC delay for stable init.

ethernet.note: Transformer-coupled to RJ45 with integrated magnetics (HR911105A).

pins.notes: SPI to Ethernet. 25MHz crystal. RJ45 with integrated magnetics required. PMODE pins set PHY mode.

mcp2515.ipc610_notes: SOIC-18W. Requires 8MHz or 16MHz crystal. Needs MCP2562 CAN transceiver. 120 ohm termination at bus ends.

connection_hints.notes: SPI CAN controller. INT pin for RX/TX/error interrupts.

pins.notes: SPI CAN controller. Needs MCP2562 transceiver between TXCAN/RXCAN and CAN bus. 8MHz crystal between OSC1/OSC2.

cp2102n.ipc610_notes: QFN-24. USB D+/D- must be differential pair routed (90 ohm). Keep USB traces short and equal length.

connection_hints.notes: USB-UART bridge. DTR/RTS used for ESP32 auto-reset during programming.

UART.note: DTR+RTS for ESP32 auto-reset boot circuit

control.name: VIO
control.note: I/O voltage reference — connect to 3.3V for 3.3V UART levels

control.name: VREGIN
control.note: USB VBUS input for internal 3.3V regulator

pins.notes: GND is exposed pad only. VIO sets UART logic level. DTR/RTS used for ESP32 auto-reset programming circuit.

cp2102n.substitution_notes: Specific part required — do not substitute.

drv8833.ipc610_notes: WSON-10. Dual H-bridge — 2 DC motors or 1 stepper. Flyback diodes integrated. Current limit via sense resistors.
drv8833.output_connector_note: 2x motor outputs (OUT1/OUT2 + OUT3/OUT4) to 4-pin screw terminal. Each pair drives one DC motor.
drv8833.user_cable_note: Connect DC motor wires to screw terminals. 2 motors max. Motor voltage via VM pin (2.7-10.8V).
safety_warnings: Motor power rail MUST be isolated from logic power via ferrite bead (auto-added)
High-current motor traces: minimum 1mm width per amp
Motor stall current can be 5-10x running current — verify driver thermal limits
Flyback/snubber protection required if motor lacks integrated flyback diodes

connection_hints.notes: Dual H-bridge. 4 PWM pins for speed/direction. nSLEEP to enable, nFAULT for overcurrent detect.

pins.notes: Dual H-bridge. AIN1/AIN2 and BIN1/BIN2 accept PWM for speed control. EEP must be HIGH to run.

drv8833.auto_add_note: Bulk cap (470µF) and TVS diode auto-added on VMOT rail for back-EMF protection.

drv8825.ipc610_notes: HTSSOP-28. Exposed pad to ground plane via thermal vias. Microstepping up to 1/32. Current limit via VREF.
drv8825.user_cable_note: Connect stepper motor 4-wire cable (A1/A2/B1/B2) to screw terminals. NEMA17 standard. Motor power via VMOT (8.2-45V).
safety_warnings: Motor power rail MUST be isolated from logic power via ferrite bead (auto-added)
High-current motor traces: minimum 1mm width per amp
Motor stall current can be 5-10x running current — verify driver thermal limits
Flyback/snubber protection required if motor lacks integrated flyback diodes

connection_hints.notes: Stepper driver. STEP/DIR/EN minimum. M0-M2 for microstepping (can tie to VCC/GND for fixed mode).

CONTROL.note: Step pulse and direction input from MCU

control.name: M2
control.note: Microstepping mode bit 2. All low = full step.

control.name: nRESET
control.note: Active low reset. Tie to nSLEEP if not used.

control.name: nSLEEP
control.note: Active low sleep. Tie to VCC for always-on.

control.name: DECAY
control.note: Decay mode select. NC or tie low for slow decay.

control.name: ISENA
control.note: Current sense resistor A — to GND via Rsense

control.name: ISENB
control.note: Current sense resistor B — to GND via Rsense

pins.notes: Stepper driver. STEP/DIR interface. nENABLE/nRESET/nSLEEP are active LOW. M0-M2 set microstepping (up to 1/32). ISENA/ISENB set max current via sense resistors.

drv8825.auto_add_note: Bulk cap (470µF) and TVS diode auto-added on VMOT rail for back-EMF protection.

relay_srd05vdc.ipc610_notes: Through-hole relay. Requires flyback diode across coil. Drive via NPN transistor — coil draws too much for GPIO.

pins.notes: Coil via N-MOSFET. Flyback diode mandatory (auto-added). COM/NO/NC for load switching.

ws2812b.ipc610_notes: PLCC-4 5050. Data line needs 3.3V-to-5V level shifting (74AHCT125). 100nF cap per LED. Data chain topology.
ws2812b.output_connector_note: WS2812B strip connection: 5V/DIN/GND to 3-pin screw terminal. Data pin needs level shifting (3.3V MCU to 5V strip).
ws2812b.user_cable_note: WS2812B/SK6812 LED strip. Connect 5V, Data In, and GND. For long strips (>30 LEDs), inject power at both ends. ~£5/meter.

connection_hints.notes: Single GPIO for addressable LED data. Through 330R series resistor.

pins.notes: Polarised LED. Cathode marked on package.

piezo_buzzer.ipc610_notes: Through-hole piezo. Active (internal oscillator) or passive (needs PWM). Sound hole must not be blocked.
piezo_buzzer.user_cable_note: On-board component. No external cable needed.

pins.notes: Pin assignment depends on application context.

ssd1306_oled.ipc610_notes: Module via 4-pin header (VCC, GND, SCL, SDA). I2C 0x3C or 0x3D. Mount at board edge for visibility.
ssd1306_oled.user_cable_note: SSD1306 0.96" OLED module connects via 4-pin I2C header (VCC/GND/SDA/SCL). Module ~£3. Plugs directly into header or via 4-pin DuPont cable.

connection_hints.notes: 0x3C or 0x3D via resistor on module.

pins.notes: Module with 4-pin header. I2C address 0x3C default, 0x3D by moving PCB resistor.

hd44780_lcd.ipc610_notes: 16-pin header. Can use 4-bit mode (6 GPIO) or I2C backpack (PCF8574). Contrast via 10k pot or resistor divider.
hd44780_lcd.user_cable_note: HD44780 16x2 LCD module. Recommended: buy with I2C backpack pre-soldered — connects via 4-pin I2C header. Without backpack: use 16-pin parallel header. Module ~£4.

connection_hints.notes: Via PCF8574 I2C backpack. Address 0x27 (some modules 0x3F).

pins.notes: 5V display. Use I2C backpack (PCF8574, auto-added) to save GPIO pins. Only needs SDA+SCL.

ili9341_tft.ipc610_notes: Module via SPI (SCK, MOSI, DC, CS, RST). High backlight current. Touch variant adds XPT2046 on separate CS.
ili9341_tft.user_cable_note: ILI9341 2.4" TFT module connects via 8-pin SPI header. Module ~£5. Some modules include SD card slot (extra pins). Check module pinout matches board header.

connection_hints.notes: SPI + DC (data/command) + RST + backlight PWM.

control.name: LED
control.note: Backlight. Connect via MOSFET for PWM brightness control.

pins.notes: SPI TFT. Needs 4 SPI pins + DC + RST + LED = 7 GPIOs total.

tactile_switch_6mm.ipc610_notes: Through-hole 6mm tactile. Needs 10k pull-up/down and 100nF debounce cap. Place accessible to user.

pins.notes: Pin assignment depends on application context.

ec11_rotary_encoder.ipc610_notes: Through-hole. 10k pull-ups on A/B channels plus 100nF debounce caps. Quadrature output.

pins.notes: Pin assignment depends on application context.

mpr121.ipc610_notes: QFN-20. 12 touch channels. Pads are exposed copper on PCB. I2C addr 0x5A-0x5D via ADDR pin.

connection_hints.notes: ADDR pin: 0x5A-0x5D. IRQ when touch state changes.

pins.notes: 12 capacitive touch electrodes. Route touch traces as wide as possible with ground guard.

sd_card_socket.ipc610_notes: SMD card socket at board edge. Card detect switch included. SPI mode: CS, SCK, MOSI, MISO. 10k pull-ups on data lines.

connection_hints.notes: SPI mode SD card.

pins.notes: SPI mode. CS/MOSI/SCK/MISO to MCU SPI bus. CD pin for card presence detection.

ds3231.ipc610_notes: SOIC-16W. Integrated TCXO — no external crystal. VBAT to CR2032 holder. I2C fixed at 0x68. +/-2ppm accuracy.

connection_hints.notes: 0x68 — CONFLICTS with MPU-6050. Both fixed address. Cannot coexist on same I2C bus.

I2C.note: Fixed address — conflicts with MPU6050 default

pins.notes: Fixed I2C 0x68 — conflicts with MPU6050 at default address. Use MPU6050 AD0=HIGH (0x69) if both present.

at24c256.ipc610_notes: SOIC-8. 256Kbit (32KB). Address pins A0-A2 for up to 8 devices on I2C bus. Write protect available.

connection_hints.notes: A0-A2 set address 0x50-0x57. WP pin: tie to GND for write-enable.

pins.notes: I2C address 0x50 + A1:A0. Up to 4 on same bus (0x50-0x53).

ads1115.ipc610_notes: MSOP-10. 16-bit 4-channel ADC. I2C addr 0x48-0x4B via ADDR. Internal PGA. Keep analogue away from digital noise.

connection_hints.notes: ADDR pin: GND=0x48, VDD=0x49, SDA=0x4A, SCL=0x4B. 4 possible addresses.

pins.notes: 4 address options via ADDR pin — up to 4 on same bus (16 ADC channels total).

hr911105a.ipc610_notes: Through-hole RJ45 + magnetics. Board edge. LED pins optional. Shield to chassis ground via 1nF cap.
hr911105a.user_cable_note: Standard Ethernet Cat5e/Cat6 patch cable. RJ45 magnetics integrated in jack.

pins.notes: RJ45 with integrated magnetics (HR911105A). Connect to W5500 TX/RX pairs.

sma_edge_connector.ipc610_notes: Edge-mount SMA. 50 ohm. Board edge. Ground tabs to ground plane. Coplanar waveguide trace from RF module.
sma_edge_connector.user_cable_note: SMA whip antenna for LoRa (868/915MHz matched). ~£3.

pins.notes: 50Ω impedance. Maintain controlled impedance trace to antenna/module.

cr2032_holder.ipc610_notes: Coin cell holder for RTC backup. Polarity markings on silkscreen.

pins.notes: Pin assignment depends on application context.

74ahct125.ipc610_notes: TSSOP-14. Quad buffer. 3.3V input to 5V output. For WS2812B data. OE active low — tie to GND.
74ahct125.output_connector_note: WS2812B strip connection: 5V/DIN/GND to 3-pin screw terminal. Data pin needs level shifting (3.3V MCU to 5V strip).
74ahct125.user_cable_note: WS2812B/SK6812 LED strip. Connect 5V, Data In, and GND. For long strips (>30 LEDs), inject power at both ends. ~£5/meter.

pins.notes: 4-channel 3.3V→5V level shifter. OE active low (tie to GND to enable). Input threshold 0.8V — works with 3.3V logic.

cap_100nf_0402.ipc610_notes: 0402 MLCC, X5R, 16V. Standard decoupling. Within 2mm of IC power pin.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

cap_100nf_0402.substitution_notes: Standard value — any C equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.
cap_100nf_0402.auto_add_note: Add 1× 100nF per VDD pin on every IC. Place as close to pin as possible.

cap_10uf_0805.ipc610_notes: 0805 MLCC, X5R, 25V. Bulk decoupling. Within 5mm of regulator input/output.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

cap_10uf_0805.substitution_notes: Standard value — any C equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

res_4k7_0402.ipc610_notes: 0402, 5%. Standard I2C pull-up for 100kHz. One per I2C line, near MCU.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

res_4k7_0402.substitution_notes: Standard value — any R equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.
res_4k7_0402.auto_add_note: Add 2× 4.7kΩ pull-ups (SDA + SCL) per I2C bus. Only one set per bus, not per device.

res_10k_0402.ipc610_notes: 0402, 5%. General pull-up/down. For button debounce, reset lines, CS defaults.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

res_10k_0402.substitution_notes: Standard value — any R equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

res_330r_0402.ipc610_notes: 0402 330R 5%. Current limiting for blue/white status LED (~9mA at 3.3V). Also general purpose.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

res_330r_0402.substitution_notes: Standard value — any R equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

led_0805_green.ipc610_notes: 0805 SMD LED, green, 2V Vf, 20mA max. Needs series 330R resistor. Check polarity.

pins.notes: Polarised LED. Cathode marked on package.

diode_1n4148ws.ipc610_notes: SOD-323. Flyback protection for relays/motors. Cathode to positive rail. Also for reverse polarity protection.

pins.notes: Polarised. Cathode marked with band on package.

ov2640.ipc610_notes: FPC connector for camera module. DCMI/parallel to MCU. Needs Tier 3 MCU (STM32H7). I2C for config (SCCB).

power_modes.notes: Power-gate with P-FET for battery designs.

connection_hints.notes: DVP 8-bit parallel. Only on ESP32-CAM or STM32 DCMI. Needs 13+ GPIO.

I2C.note: SCCB protocol (I2C compatible) for register config

pins.notes: 8-bit DVP parallel interface. ESP32 uses GPIO for D0-D7. Needs XCLK (typically 20MHz from MCU PWM).

mcp2562.ipc610_notes: SOIC-8. CAN FD capable transceiver. Pairs with MCP2515 controller. 120 ohm termination resistor at each bus end. CANH/CANL traces should be routed as differential pair.

connection_hints.notes: CAN transceiver. TXD/RXD to MCU CAN peripheral, CANH/CANL to bus.

pins.notes: CAN transceiver. TXD/RXD connect to MCP2515 or MCU CAN peripheral. CANH/CANL to bus.

w25q32jv.ipc610_notes: SOIC-8 wide body. 32Mbit (4MB) SPI NOR flash. Quad SPI capable. CS needs 10k pull-up when not in use. Hold/WP pins need pull-ups if unused.

connection_hints.notes: SPI flash. WP/HOLD tie to VCC if not used.

control.name: WP
control.note: Write protect — active low. Pull high for normal write.

control.name: HOLD
control.note: Pause SPI — active low. Pull high for normal operation.

pins.notes: 32Mbit (4MB) NOR flash. Required by RP2040 for code storage.

jst_ph_2pin.ipc610_notes: Through-hole 2mm pitch. Standard LiPo battery connector. Place at board edge. Polarity must match common LiPo wiring (pin 1 = positive).
safety_warnings: LiPo batteries are a fire and explosion risk
Verify polarity before connecting — reversed LiPo = immediate damage
Use batteries with built-in protection PCB when possible
Store LiPo at 3.7-3.8V for long-term storage
Never puncture, crush, or short-circuit LiPo cells
Charge only in fireproof location

pins.notes: Polarised keyed connector. Verify LiPo polarity matches before connecting.

jst_ph_2pin.auto_add_note: LiPo battery needs: TP4056 charger, DW01A+FS8205A protection, charge/standby LEDs.

sim7080g.ipc610_notes: LCC module. Peak current 500mA during TX — needs robust power supply with bulk capacitor. UART AT command interface. Auto-adds nano-SIM holder and LTE antenna.

connection_hints.notes: UART at 115200. PWRKEY: pulse 1s to toggle power. RI: ring indicator interrupt.

control.name: PWRKEY
control.note: Pull low >1s to toggle power. Use N-FET driver.

antenna.note: U.FL to SMA via coax or PCB antenna. 50Ω matched.

pins.notes: VBAT direct from LiPo (not 3.3V regulator — draws up to 2A TX bursts). 100µF local bulk cap mandatory.

nano_sim_holder.ipc610_notes: Push-push nano-SIM socket. Place at board edge for card access. ESD protection recommended on SIM data lines.
nano_sim_holder.user_cable_note: Nano-SIM card with NB-IoT/LTE-M data plan (e.g. 1NCE £8/10yr).

pins.notes: Connect to SIM7080G SIM interface pins.

ufl_antenna_connector.ipc610_notes: SMD coaxial connector for external antenna cable. 50 ohm. Ground plane around connector critical. Used for LTE, GPS, and other RF antenna connections.
ufl_antenna_connector.user_cable_note: U.FL to SMA pigtail cable (15cm) + LTE/NB-IoT antenna. ~£5 total.

pins.notes: 50Ω impedance. Maintain controlled impedance trace to antenna/module.

max485.ipc610_notes: SOIC-8. Half-duplex RS-485 transceiver. A/B differential pair. 120 ohm termination resistor at each bus end. DE/RE pins controlled by MCU GPIO for TX/RX direction.

connection_hints.notes: RS-485 transceiver. DE/RE tied together for half-duplex.

pins.notes: DI=data in (MCU TX), RO=data out (MCU RX). DE/RE tied together for half-duplex. A/B to bus via CMC + TVS.

max485.substitution_notes: Specific part required — do not substitute.

ekmc1603111.ipc610_notes: Through-hole 3-pin PIR sensor with built-in amplifier and comparator. Digital output. Fresnel lens determines detection pattern. Place facing detection zone with clear line of sight.

connection_hints.notes: Digital output — HIGH when motion detected. Open-drain, needs pull-up.

GPIO.note: Digital output — HIGH on motion detect. Connect to any GPIO.

pins.notes: Digital output — no ADC needed. 3.3V operation.

ina219.ipc610_notes: SOIC-8. High-side current/power monitor. Requires precision shunt resistor (0.1 ohm typical). I2C addr configurable (0x40-0x4F). Measures voltage, current, and power simultaneously.
ina219.user_cable_note: On-board component. Soldered directly to PCB. No external cable needed.

connection_hints.notes: A0/A1 pins set address. 0x40-0x4F range. Conflicts with Si7021 at 0x40.

sense_inputs.note: Connect shunt resistor between IN+ (pin 8) and IN- (pin 7)

pins.notes: A1(pin1)/A0(pin2) select from 16 addresses. Shunt resistor (0.1Ω 1%) between pins 7 and 8.

tsop38238.ipc610_notes: Through-hole 3-pin. 38kHz carrier frequency (standard for most IR remotes). Demodulated output. Place with dome facing outward, unobstructed.

connection_hints.notes: Demodulated IR output. Active LOW when IR signal received.

GPIO.note: Demodulated IR output. Connect to any GPIO with timer capture.

pins.notes: 38kHz carrier demodulation. 100nF + 47µF decoupling recommended.

ir_led_940nm.ipc610_notes: Through-hole 5mm IR LED, 940nm. Requires current-limiting resistor and NPN transistor driver for adequate range. Point in same direction as IR receiver.

pins.notes: Polarised LED. Cathode marked on package.

pn532.ipc610_notes: QFN-32. Requires external NFC antenna (PCB trace coil or wire-wound). Matching circuit needed (see NXP AN1445). Keep metal away from antenna area.
pn532.user_cable_note: On-board IC. PCB includes etched coil antenna. For extended range, connect external NFC antenna coil via 2-pin header.

power_modes.notes: LP card detect: ~20mA. Use interrupt-driven wake for access control.

connection_hints.notes: I2C mode (I0=1, I1=0). Also supports SPI. IRQ for tag detect.

antenna.note: NFC antenna coil. Use reference PCB antenna design.

pins.notes: Interface selected by I0/I1 pins at boot. I2C default: I0=HIGH, I1=LOW.

max30102.ipc610_notes: OLGA-14 optical module. Red + IR LEDs and photodetector integrated. Must be placed against skin with optical window clear. Glass or clear plastic cover only. I2C fixed at 0x57.
max30102.user_cable_note: On-board component. Soldered directly to PCB. No external cable needed.

connection_hints.notes: Fixed address.

pins.notes: Fixed address 0x57. Optical sensor — requires direct skin contact, no cover glass.

drv2605l.ipc610_notes: MSOP-10. Drives both LRA and ERM motors. 123 built-in haptic waveforms. Auto-resonance for LRA. I2C addr fixed at 0x5A.

connection_hints.notes: Fixed address. EN pin for power control.

pins.notes: Haptic driver for LRA or ERM motors. Fixed I2C address 0x5A. 150+ built-in haptic effects.

lra_motor.ipc610_notes: Linear resonant actuator 8mm disc. Driven by DRV2605L. Solder wires to pads or use 2-pin connector. Secure to PCB or enclosure with adhesive.

pins.notes: Pin assignment depends on application context.

hx711.ipc610_notes: SOP-16. 24-bit ADC designed for Wheatstone bridge load cells. Two GPIO pins (CLK + DATA) — not I2C/SPI. Keep analogue inputs away from digital noise. Excitation voltage from AVDD.

connection_hints.notes: Custom 2-wire protocol (not I2C). DOUT=data, PD_SCK=clock. Rate pin: GND=10Hz, VCC=80Hz.

GPIO.note: Custom 2-wire protocol, not I2C/SPI. Connect to any 2 GPIOs.

pins.notes: Channel A: gain 128 or 64. Channel B: gain 32. Connect load cell Wheatstone bridge to INP/INN.

soil_moisture_capacitive.ipc610_notes: 3-pin header connector (VCC, GND, AOUT). Analogue output proportional to moisture. Requires MCU ADC channel. External probe connects via cable — connector only on main PCB.
soil_moisture_capacitive.user_cable_note: Capacitive soil moisture probe with 3-pin cable. ~£2.

ADC.note: Analogue output 0-3V. Connect to ADC input.

pins.notes: Analogue output proportional to soil moisture. Calibration required per soil type.

res_250r_precision.ipc610_notes: 0805 precision thin film, 0.1% tolerance. 250 ohm converts 4-20mA to 1-5V for ADC input. Use with ADS1115 or MCU ADC. Keep traces short to minimise noise.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

res_250r_precision.substitution_notes: Standard value — any R equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

screw_terminal_2pin.ipc610_notes: Through-hole screw terminal, 5.08mm pitch. Industrial wire connection for 4-20mA sensors, RS-485 bus, and power input. Accepts 12-24 AWG wire.

pins.notes: Screw terminal. Wire gauge: 12-22 AWG depending on terminal rating.

screw_terminal_2pin.mains_use_note: When used as mains input terminal: must be rated 250VAC 10A minimum. Verify LCSC part rating. Label L and N on silkscreen.

max3232.ipc610_notes: SOIC-16. Dual TX/RX RS-232 transceiver. Requires 4x 100nF charge pump capacitors. Internal charge pump generates +/-6V from 3.3V supply. Pair with DB9 connector or screw terminal.

connection_hints.notes: RS-232 level shifter. UART on MCU side, DB9 on line side. Needs 4x 100nF charge pump caps.

pins.notes: 2-channel RS-232 level converter. 4x 100nF caps for charge pump (auto-added). T1IN/R1OUT to MCU UART, T1OUT/R1IN to DB9.

max3232.substitution_notes: Specific part required — do not substitute.

db9_female.ipc610_notes: Through-hole right-angle DB9. Place at board edge. Standard RS-232 pinout (DCE or DTE — match to application). Mounting screws provide mechanical retention.
db9_female.user_cable_note: DB9 male-to-male serial cable (straight or null-modem depending on device).

pins.notes: Pin assignment depends on application context.

max490.ipc610_notes: SOIC-8. Full-duplex RS-422 transceiver. 4-wire differential (TX+/TX-, RX+/RX-). 120 ohm termination at receiver end. Supports up to 10Mbps. Up to 1200m cable length at lower baud rates.

connection_hints.notes: RS-422 full-duplex transceiver.

pins.notes: Full-duplex RS-422. Y/Z=TX pair, A/B=RX pair.

mcp4725.ipc610_notes: SOT-23-6. 12-bit I2C DAC, 0-3.3V output. For 0-10V use: feed output to non-inverting op-amp with gain of ~3.03. I2C addr 0x60 (A0 variant) or 0x61 (A1). EEPROM stores last setting.
mcp4725.output_connector_note: 0-10V signal output to 2-pin screw terminal. MCP4725 DAC → LM358 gain stage → screw terminal.
mcp4725.user_cable_note: 2-wire to building automation actuator (HVAC damper, dimmer, VFD). Standard 0-10V control.

connection_hints.notes: A0 pin sets address. 0x60 or 0x61.

pins.notes: 12-bit DAC. A0 for 2 addresses. Output range 0 to VDD.

lm358.ipc610_notes: SOIC-8. Dual op-amp. For 0-10V output: non-inverting config with gain ~3.03 (6.8k/3.3k). Powered from building 12V or 24V rail. Output can swing to within 1.5V of V+ rail. Two channels per package — serves 2 output channels.

pins.notes: Dual op-amp. Rail-to-rail input, not output. Output swings to ~1.5V below VCC.

si2302cds.ipc610_notes: SOT-23 N-channel MOSFET. Logic-level gate (Vgs(th) 0.7V typical — fully on at 2.5V gate). 2.6A continuous, 20V Vds. Lowside switch: load between V+ and drain, source to GND, gate from MCU GPIO. Add 10k pull-down on gate to ensure off-state at boot.
si2302cds.output_connector_note: WS2812B strip connection: 5V/DIN/GND to 3-pin screw terminal. Data pin needs level shifting (3.3V MCU to 5V strip).
si2302cds.user_cable_note: WS2812B/SK6812 LED strip. Connect 5V, Data In, and GND. For long strips (>30 LEDs), inject power at both ends. ~£5/meter.

pins.notes: Check datasheet for pinout — varies by package.

ao3401a.ipc610_notes: SOT-23 P-channel MOSFET. Logic-level gate (Vgs(th) -0.7V typical). -4.2A continuous, -30V Vds. Highside switch: source to V+, load between drain and GND, gate pulled high (off) by default via 10k to V+. MCU pulls gate low to turn on. Use for power-gating sensor modules during deep sleep.

pins.notes: Check datasheet for pinout — varies by package.

test_point_smd.ipc610_notes: SMD pad test point, 1.5mm diameter. Exposed copper pad for pogo pin or scope probe contact. Place on signal side. No component body — just a pad. Used for power rails, key signals, and bus lines during manufacturing test and debug.

pins.notes: Single pad test point for probe contact.

test_point_loop.ipc610_notes: Through-hole wire loop test point. Accepts mini-grabber or hook probe clips. 1mm drill. Taller profile than SMD pads but much easier for hand-probing during development. Consider using for GND and key power rails.

pins.notes: Through-hole loop test point for scope probe hook.

swd_header_10pin.ipc610_notes: SMD 2x5 pin header, 1.27mm pitch. Standard ARM Cortex debug connector (SWDIO, SWCLK, SWO, nRST, VTref, GND). Required for RP2040, nRF52840, STM32 firmware loading and debugging. Place at board edge for probe access. Tag-Connect alternative: TC2050-IDC.
swd_header_10pin.user_cable_note: SWD debug probe (J-Link EDU Mini ~£18 or ST-Link V2 clone ~£3). 10-pin ribbon cable.

pins.notes: Standard 2.54mm pitch header. Pin assignment depends on connected module.

tag_connect_tc2050.ipc610_notes: No-legs pogo-pin debug footprint. Zero component cost — just PCB pads and alignment holes. Requires Tag-Connect cable for use. Much smaller than pin header. Ideal for production boards where debug access is occasional. Same 10-pin ARM SWD pinout.

pins.notes: Pogo-pin programming footprint. No physical connector — just PCB pads.

tag_connect_tc2050.lcsc_note: Footprint only — no physical connector needed

avr_isp_6pin.ipc610_notes: Through-hole 2x3 pin header, 2.54mm pitch. Standard AVR ISP pinout (MISO, VCC, SCK, MOSI, RST, GND). Required for ATmega328P bootloader burning and firmware upload. Place at board edge.

pins.notes: Standard 2.54mm pitch header. Pin assignment depends on connected module.

ld2410c.ipc610_notes: 24GHz FMCW radar module, 1.27mm pin header. 5-pin: VCC(5V), GND, TX, RX, OUT. Mount at board edge facing detection zone — 10mm keepout behind antenna. No metal or components within 10mm of antenna face. Detects stationary humans via breathing at up to 5m. UART 256000 baud. ESPHome native support.
ld2410c.user_cable_note: On-board component. Soldered directly to PCB. No external cable needed.

power_modes.notes: Always-on radar — no low-power mode. Not for battery without power gating.

connection_hints.notes: UART config/data + digital OUT pin (presence yes/no). 5V power, 3.3V UART logic.

control.name: OUT
control.note: Digital presence output — HIGH when presence detected

pins.notes: 5V power, 3.3V UART logic. TX/RX can connect directly to 3.3V MCU.

ld2412.ipc610_notes: 24GHz FMCW radar module, 2.54mm pin header. Larger form factor than LD2410C with extended 8m+ range. Same UART protocol. Mount at board edge. 15mm antenna keepout zone. ESPHome native support (ld2412 component).
ld2412.user_cable_note: On-board component. Soldered directly to PCB. No external cable needed.

connection_hints.notes: Same as LD2410C but longer range.

pins.notes: 5V power, 3.3V UART logic.

ld2412.lcsc_note: Newer variant — may not be on LCSC yet

inmp441.ipc610_notes: Bottom-port MEMS microphone. Sound port hole required in PCB (drill 1mm hole under component pad). Keep away from noisy components (switching regulators). I2S output — WS pin selects L/R channel (tie low for left). ESPHome i2s_audio microphone platform.

connection_hints.notes: I2S MEMS mic. L/R pin selects left(GND) or right(VCC) channel.

control.name: L/R
control.note: Low=left channel, High=right channel. Set differently for stereo pair.

pins.notes: I2S output. L/R pin selects left/right stereo channel.

max98357a.ipc610_notes: QFN-16. I2S DAC with 3.2W Class D amplifier. Filterless output — connect directly to speaker. GAIN pin selects 3/6/9/12/15dB gain via resistor divider. SD_MODE pin for shutdown/left/right/mono channel select. ESPHome i2s_audio speaker platform. Needs external speaker (4-8 ohm).
max98357a.user_cable_note: On-board component. No external cable needed.

connection_hints.notes: I2S DAC+amp. GAIN: GND=9dB, VCC=15dB. SD_MODE: HIGH=on, LOW=shutdown.

control.name: SD_MODE
control.note: LOW=shutdown, HIGH=left, pull to mid-rail for right channel via resistor

speaker_output.note: Bridge-tied load — connect speaker directly, no coupling cap needed

pins.notes: I2S DAC + 3.2W class D amp. SD_MODE selects L/R or shutdown. Speaker connects directly between OUTP/OUTN.

speaker_connector_2pin.ipc610_notes: Through-hole JST-PH 2mm pitch. For connecting 4-8 ohm speaker to MAX98357A output. Same connector as LiPo battery — ensure silkscreen labels are clear.
speaker_connector_2pin.user_cable_note: 4Ω or 8Ω speaker with JST-PH 2-pin plug. 1-3W for voice assistant output. ~£2.

pins.notes: Standard 2.54mm pitch header. Pin assignment depends on connected module.

epaper_2_9inch.ipc610_notes: FPC connector for Waveshare-compatible e-paper displays. 24-pin 0.5mm pitch FFC. SPI interface (CLK, MOSI, CS, DC, RST, BUSY). Display retains image without power — ideal for battery dashboards. Partial refresh supported on some models. ESPHome waveshare_epaper platform.
epaper_2_9inch.user_cable_note: Waveshare 2.9" e-paper display connects via 24-pin FFC cable (included with display). Module ~£9. Low power — holds image with zero power draw.

connection_hints.notes: SPI + DC + RST + BUSY (check when refresh complete).

control.name: BUSY
control.note: HIGH when display is updating. Poll before sending new data.

pins.notes: SPI write-only (no MISO). BUSY pin must be monitored — update takes 2-15 seconds.

ct_clamp_jack.ipc610_notes: SMD 3.5mm stereo jack. Standard connector for SCT-013 non-invasive CT clamp current sensors. Tip = signal, sleeve = ground. Requires burden resistor (typically 33 ohm for SCT-013-030) and bias voltage divider to mid-rail for ADC input. Route to ADS1115 or MCU ADC.
ct_clamp_jack.user_cable_note: SCT-013-030 CT clamp (30A/1V output) with 3.5mm jack. ~£5.

pins.notes: Pin assignment depends on application context.

mcp23017.ipc610_notes: SSOP-28. 16-bit I2C GPIO expander. Two 8-bit ports (PORTA/PORTB). I2C addr 0x20-0x27 via A0-A2 pins. Interrupt output pins (INTA/INTB) for input change detection. 25mA sink/source per pin. ESPHome mcp23017 platform. Supports input pullups.
mcp23017.user_cable_note: On-board IC. 16 GPIO pins broken out to pin headers on board edge. Wire external devices to headers.

connection_hints.notes: A0-A2 set address 0x20-0x27. 8 possible on one bus.

pins.notes: 16-bit GPIO expander. 8 addresses (A0-A2). Each pin individually configurable in/out with pull-up.

pcf8574.ipc610_notes: SOIC-16. 8-bit I2C GPIO expander. I2C addr 0x20-0x27 via A0-A2. Quasi-bidirectional I/O — weak pullup, strong pulldown. INT output for input change notification. Lower pin count and cheaper than MCP23017. ESPHome pcf8574 platform.
pcf8574.user_cable_note: On-board IC. 8 GPIO pins broken out to pin headers. Also used internally as I2C LCD backpack driver.

connection_hints.notes: A0-A2 set address 0x20-0x27. CONFLICTS with MCP23017 at same default address.

control.name: INT
control.note: Active low interrupt on any pin change

pins.notes: 8-bit GPIO expander. Quasi-bidirectional I/O. 8 addresses (0x20-0x27).

crystal_16mhz.ipc610_notes: HC-49S SMD crystal. Required for ATmega328P. Place within 10mm of XTAL1/XTAL2 pins. Requires 2x 22pF load capacitors to ground. Ground plane under crystal reduces noise coupling. Auto-add with ATmega328P.

pins.notes: Non-polarised. Load caps from each pin to GND. Layout: solid unbroken ground plane on L2 under crystal for shielding. NO signal traces on ANY layer under crystal area. Guard ring on L1 around crystal. Each load cap gets its own ground via to L2 within 1mm of cap pad.

layout_constraints.ground_plane_L2: SOLID — unbroken ground plane required under crystal + 3mm margin

crystal_12mhz.ipc610_notes: SMD 3.2x1.5mm crystal. Required for RP2040. Place within 5mm of XIN/XOUT pins. Requires 2x 15pF load capacitors. Follow Raspberry Pi hardware design guide for layout. Auto-add with RP2040.

pins.notes: Non-polarised. Load caps from each pin to GND. Layout: solid unbroken ground plane on L2 under crystal for shielding. NO signal traces on ANY layer under crystal area. Guard ring on L1 around crystal. Each load cap gets its own ground via to L2 within 1mm of cap pad.

layout_constraints.ground_plane_L2: SOLID — unbroken ground plane required under crystal + 3mm margin

crystal_32mhz.ipc610_notes: SMD 2.0x1.6mm crystal. Required for nRF52840 HFXO. Place within 3mm of XC1/XC2 pins. Follow Nordic reference design layout. Internal load caps may be used (check nRF52840 config). Auto-add with nRF52840.

pins.notes: Non-polarised. Load caps from each pin to GND. Layout: solid unbroken ground plane on L2 under crystal for shielding. NO signal traces on ANY layer under crystal area. Guard ring on L1 around crystal. Each load cap gets its own ground via to L2 within 1mm of cap pad.

layout_constraints.ground_plane_L2: SOLID — unbroken ground plane required under crystal + 3mm margin

crystal_8mhz.ipc610_notes: SMD 3.2x1.5mm crystal. Required for STM32H743 HSE. Place within 5mm of OSC_IN/OSC_OUT. Requires 2x 20pF load capacitors. PLL multiplies to 480MHz system clock. Auto-add with STM32H743.

pins.notes: Non-polarised. Load caps from each pin to GND. Layout: solid unbroken ground plane on L2 under crystal for shielding. NO signal traces on ANY layer under crystal area. Guard ring on L1 around crystal. Each load cap gets its own ground via to L2 within 1mm of cap pad.

layout_constraints.ground_plane_L2: SOLID — unbroken ground plane required under crystal + 3mm margin

crystal_32khz.ipc610_notes: SMD 1.6x1.0mm 32.768kHz crystal for low-frequency oscillator. Required for nRF52840 LFXO (accurate BLE timing) and STM32 LSE (RTC). Place close to MCU. Sensitive to noise — keep away from switching regulators. Auto-add with nRF52840 and STM32.

pins.notes: Non-polarised. Load caps from each pin to GND. CRITICAL: Remove ground plane (L2) and power plane (L3) directly under this crystal — high impedance 32kHz oscillator is extremely sensitive to parasitic capacitance. Ground pour on L2 under this crystal WILL cause startup failure or multi-second startup delay. Place ground vias for load caps at the edge of the keepout zone, not under the crystal.

layout_constraints.ground_plane_L2: REMOVED — copper keepout on L2 AND L3 under crystal footprint + 1mm margin
layout_constraints.load_cap_ground_via_position: At edge of keepout zone, NOT under crystal

cap_22pf_0402.ipc610_notes: 0402 C0G/NP0 22pF. Crystal load capacitor. Place immediately adjacent to crystal pins, close to ground via. C0G dielectric mandatory for frequency stability. Used in pairs (one per crystal pin to GND).

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

cap_22pf_0402.substitution_notes: Standard value — any C equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.
cap_22pf_0402.description: C0G/NP0 dielectric required for crystal load caps.

cap_15pf_0402.ipc610_notes: 0402 C0G/NP0 15pF. Crystal load capacitor for RP2040 12MHz crystal. Place immediately adjacent to crystal pins.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

cap_15pf_0402.substitution_notes: Standard value — any C equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.
cap_15pf_0402.description: C0G/NP0 dielectric required for crystal load caps.

usblc6_2sc6.ipc610_notes: SOT-23-6. Dual-line USB ESD protection. Place as close to USB connector as possible. Protects D+/D- lines. Low capacitance (1.5pF) — safe for USB 2.0 High Speed. Auto-add whenever USB connector is present.

pins.notes: Polarised. Cathode marked with band on package.

sm712.ipc610_notes: SOT-23 asymmetric TVS for RS-485. Clamps A/B lines. Asymmetric breakdown (12V/7V) matches RS-485 voltage spec. Place at connector end of bus, before MAX485 transceiver. Auto-add with RS-485.

pins.notes: Polarised. Cathode marked with band on package.

pesd2can.ipc610_notes: SOT-23 dual-line CAN bus TVS. Protects CANH/CANL. Place at connector end. IEC 61000-4-2 level 4 (±15kV air). Auto-add with CAN bus.

pins.notes: Polarised. Cathode marked with band on package.

ptc_fuse_500ma.ipc610_notes: 1206 PTC resettable fuse. 500mA hold, 1A trip. Place in series on USB VBUS after connector, before regulator. Self-resets after fault clears. Meets USB power spec. Auto-add on USB power input.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

res_120r_0805.ipc610_notes: 0805 120 ohm 5%. Bus termination resistor for RS-485 (A-B) and CAN bus (CANH-CANL). Place at each physical end of bus. Auto-add with RS-485 or CAN bus.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

res_120r_0805.substitution_notes: Standard value — any R equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

reset_button.ipc610_notes: SMD tactile switch, 3x4mm low profile. Connects MCU nRST/RESET to GND. Requires 100nF debounce cap and 10k pull-up to VCC on reset line. Place at board edge for access. Auto-add for every design.

pins.notes: Pin assignment depends on application context.

boot_button.ipc610_notes: SMD tactile switch for entering boot/flash mode. ESP32: connects GPIO0 to GND (hold during reset to enter download mode). RP2040: connects BOOTSEL to GND (hold during power-up for UF2 mode). Not needed for nRF52840/STM32 (use SWD). Place next to reset button.

pins.notes: Pin assignment depends on application context.

power_led_green.ipc610_notes: 0402 green LED. Power indicator — always on when 3.3V rail is active. Requires 1k series resistor (0402) to limit current to ~1.3mA. Place near power connector or board edge. Auto-add for every design.

pins.notes: Polarised LED. Cathode marked on package.

res_1k_0402.ipc610_notes: 0402 1k 5%. Power LED current limiting resistor. Also general purpose. Auto-add with power LED.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

res_1k_0402.substitution_notes: Standard value — any R equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

status_led_blue.ipc610_notes: 0402 blue LED. User/status indicator on MCU GPIO pin. Firmware controllable — WiFi status, heartbeat, error indication. Requires 330R series resistor. Place near power LED. Auto-add for every design.

pins.notes: Polarised LED. Cathode marked on package.

mounting_hole_m3.ipc610_notes: 3.2mm drill, 6mm copper pad with vias to ground plane. Place at board corners, minimum 5mm from board edge. Provides chassis grounding when metal standoffs used. Auto-add 4x per board (one per corner).

pins.notes: Mechanical — no electrical connections.

cap_100nf_reset.ipc610_notes: 0402 100nF X7R. Reset line debounce capacitor. Place between nRST and GND, adjacent to reset button. Prevents noise-triggered resets. Auto-add with reset button.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

cap_100nf_reset.substitution_notes: Standard value — any C equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

max31855.ipc610_notes: SOIC-8. Cold-junction compensated thermocouple-to-digital converter. Type K variant (K suffix). SPI read-only (no MOSI needed). 14-bit 0.25°C resolution. Detects open/short faults. ESPHome max31855 platform. Pair with screw terminal or mini-TC connector for thermocouple wire.

connection_hints.notes: SPI read-only (MISO only, no MOSI needed). Dedicated CS pin.

pins.notes: Type K thermocouple. Read-only SPI — only needs MISO, SCK, CS (3 wires not 4).

thermocouple_connector.ipc610_notes: PCB-mount mini thermocouple connector, Type K. Place at board edge. Polarity matters — match K-type colour coding (yellow +, red -). Alternative: use 2-pin screw terminal with appropriate labelling.
thermocouple_connector.user_cable_note: Type K thermocouple probe with mini-K plug. £3-£15 depending on length/range.

pins.notes: Pin assignment depends on application context.

hcsr04_connector.ipc610_notes: 4-pin 2.54mm header. VCC(5V), TRIG, ECHO, GND. TRIG is 3.3V tolerant input. ECHO outputs 5V — needs voltage divider (2x resistors) to safely connect to 3.3V MCU ADC/GPIO. HC-SR04 module plugs directly in. ESPHome ultrasonic platform.
hcsr04_connector.user_cable_note: HC-SR04 ultrasonic module plugs directly into header. ~£1.50.

pins.notes: Standard 2.54mm pitch header. Pin assignment depends on connected module.

reed_switch_connector.ipc610_notes: JST-PH 2-pin for external magnetic reed switch. GPIO input with 10k pull-up to VCC. Reed switch connects between GPIO and GND (normally open). Multiple connectors for multiple zones. ESPHome gpio binary_sensor.
reed_switch_connector.user_cable_note: Magnetic reed switch (NO) with JST-PH pigtail. Mount on door/window frame. ~£1.

pins.notes: Standard 2.54mm pitch header. Pin assignment depends on connected module.

flow_sensor_connector.ipc610_notes: 3-pin 2.54mm header. VCC(5V), GND, SIGNAL. Hall-effect pulse output — each pulse = fixed volume of water. Count pulses via GPIO interrupt. YF-S201 (1-30L/min) most common. Signal is open-collector — needs 10k pull-up. ESPHome pulse_meter platform.
flow_sensor_connector.user_cable_note: YF-S201 water flow sensor (1/2" BSP). Lead wires connect to header. ~£3.

pins.notes: Standard 2.54mm pitch header. Pin assignment depends on connected module.

mfrc522.ipc610_notes: QFN-32. 13.56MHz RFID/NFC reader. Requires external PCB antenna (coil trace) or wire-wound antenna with matching circuit. SPI interface (also supports I2C/UART). Reads MIFARE Classic, Ultralight, NTAG213/215/216. ESPHome rc522 platform. Cheaper than PN532.
mfrc522.user_cable_note: On-board IC. PCB includes etched coil antenna — no external antenna needed. Present RFID card/tag within 3-5cm of board antenna area.

connection_hints.notes: SPI RFID reader. IRQ for tag presence.

pins.notes: SPI interface only. Standard RFID/NFC 13.56MHz reader.

tcs34725.ipc610_notes: DFN-6. RGBC color sensor with IR filter. I2C fixed addr 0x29. Integrated 4x photodiodes (R/G/B/Clear). Programmable gain and integration time. LED driver pin for illumination LED. Place with aperture unobstructed. ESPHome tcs34725 platform.
tcs34725.user_cable_note: On-board component. Soldered directly to PCB. No external cable needed.

connection_hints.notes: Fixed 0x29 — CONFLICTS with VL53L0X. Use XSHUT on VL53L0X to reassign.

pins.notes: Fixed 0x29 — conflicts with VL53L0X default. Use I2C mux (TCA9548A) if both needed.

screw_terminal_3pin.ipc610_notes: 3-pin 5.08mm pitch Phoenix-style screw terminal. CAN bus: CANH, CANL, GND. Also used for RS-422 partial (TX+/TX-/GND). Accepts 24-12AWG wire. Cable: user provides twisted pair + ground.

pins.notes: Screw terminal. Wire gauge: 12-22 AWG depending on terminal rating.

screw_terminal_4pin.ipc610_notes: 4-pin 3.81mm pitch screw terminal. For ADS1115 analog inputs (AIN0-AIN3) or general analog signal input. Smaller pitch than 5.08mm for compact boards. Also usable for load cell (HX711: E+/E-/A+/A-). Cable: user provides signal wires. Include ESD diodes on analog inputs for protection.

pins.notes: Screw terminal. Wire gauge: 12-22 AWG depending on terminal rating.

header_4pin_i2c.ipc610_notes: 4-pin 2.54mm header. Standard I2C breakout pinout: VCC/GND/SDA/SCL. Used for SSD1306 OLED modules, generic I2C sensor breakouts, Stemma/Qwiic-to-header adapters. Matches Adafruit/SparkFun module pinout convention.
header_4pin_i2c.user_cable_note: 4-pin DuPont jumper cable (F-F) to OLED module, or solder module directly. SSD1306 0.96" OLED ~£3.

pins.notes: Standard 2.54mm pitch header. Pin assignment depends on connected module.

header_3pin_servo.ipc610_notes: 3-pin 2.54mm header. Standard servo pinout: Signal/VCC(5V)/GND. Servo JR/Futaba plug connects directly. Note: most servos need 5V — if board runs 3.3V, needs 5V boost or direct battery feed. PWM signal is 3.3V tolerant on most servos.
header_3pin_servo.user_cable_note: Servo plugs directly into header (JR/Futaba connector). SG90 micro servo ~£2.

pins.notes: Standard 2.54mm pitch header. Pin assignment depends on connected module.

header_8pin_spi_display.ipc610_notes: 8-pin 2.54mm header for SPI TFT modules. Standard pinout: VCC/GND/CS/RST/DC/MOSI/SCK/LED(backlight). Matches most ILI9341 2.4/2.8 inch module pinouts. Some modules have 9 or 14 pins — check module variant. Also used for ST7735/ST7789 SPI modules.
header_8pin_spi_display.user_cable_note: 8-pin DuPont jumper cable (F-F) to TFT module. ILI9341 2.4" TFT ~£5.

pins.notes: Standard 2.54mm pitch header. Pin assignment depends on connected module.

header_16pin_lcd.ipc610_notes: 16-pin 2.54mm header. Standard HD44780 LCD pinout. WARNING: HD44780 requires 5V logic — needs level shifter from 3.3V MCU. Alternatively, use PCF8574 I2C backpack (already in DB as gpio_expander) to drive LCD via I2C with only 4-pin I2C header. Resolver should prefer I2C backpack approach for simplicity.
header_16pin_lcd.user_cable_note: HD44780 LCD 16x2 with I2C backpack soldered on. Plug into 4-pin I2C header instead. ~£4.

pins.notes: Standard 2.54mm pitch header. Pin assignment depends on connected module.

jst_ph_2pin_power.ipc610_notes: JST-PH 2-pin for external power input. Used for: AA battery holder (2xAA = 3V, 3xAA = 4.5V), solar panel input (to TP4056 charger), or general DC input. Keyed connector prevents reverse insertion. Label polarity on silkscreen.
jst_ph_2pin_power.user_cable_note: AA battery holder with JST-PH plug, or solar panel with JST-PH cable.

pins.notes: Standard 2.54mm pitch header. Pin assignment depends on connected module.

fpc_24pin_camera.ipc610_notes: Hirose FH12 24-pin 0.5mm pitch FPC connector. For OV2640 camera module connection. Bottom-contact, flip-lock actuator. Requires careful routing of parallel DVP bus (8-bit data + PCLK + HREF + VSYNC + XCLK). 4-layer PCB recommended for signal integrity. ESP32-CAM compatible pinout.
fpc_24pin_camera.user_cable_note: OV2640 camera module with 24-pin FFC cable (included with module). ~£4.

pins.notes: Standard 2.54mm pitch header. Pin assignment depends on connected module.

schottky_ss14.ipc610_notes: SMA Schottky 1A 40V, 0.45V drop. Power path diode — prevents backfeed from system to TP4056 output when USB disconnected. Place between TP4056 OUT+ and system VCC. In battery designs, ensures clean power switching between charge and discharge. Auto-add with LiPo charger.

pins.notes: Polarised. Cathode marked with band on package.

cap_47uf_elec.ipc610_notes: 1206 47µF 10V MLCC. Bulk capacitor on power input rail. Place near power connector, before regulator. One on VIN, one on each regulated rail (3.3V, 5V). Handles transient loads from WiFi/cellular transmit bursts. Auto-add on every power input.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

cap_47uf_elec.substitution_notes: Standard value — any C equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

mt3608.ipc610_notes: SOT-23-6 boost converter. 2V-24V input, up to 28V output (set by resistor divider). 2A switch current. Use for: LiPo(3.7V)→5V, 3xAA(4.5V)→5V. Needs: 22µH inductor (Bourns SRN4018-220M), Schottky diode (SS14), output divider. Keep inductor close, short traces. EMI source — keep away from antenna.

power_source.notes: 5V from LiPo for servos/HC-SR04/WS2812B/mmWave. Realistic ~1A from LiPo.

output.note: Via Schottky diode from SW pin

control.name: SW
control.note: Switching node — connect inductor + Schottky to output

control.name: FB
control.note: Feedback — resistor divider from VOUT sets output voltage

pins.notes: Boost converter. External inductor (22µH) + Schottky (SS34) + feedback divider required.

inductor_22uh.ipc610_notes: Shielded 4x4x1.8mm power inductor. 22µH, 1.5A saturation. For MT3608 boost converter. Place within 5mm of MT3608 SW pin. Short, wide traces between inductor and IC. EMI source — shielded type preferred.

pins.notes: Non-polarised. Either orientation.

res_100k_0402.ipc610_notes: 0402 100k 1%. Battery voltage divider — 2x 100k gives 50% ratio. VBAT 4.2V → ADC reads 2.1V (within 3.3V range). 1% tolerance for accurate fuel gauge reading. Low quiescent current (21uA at 4.2V) — acceptable for battery life. Add 100nF filter cap on ADC pin. Auto-add with LiPo power.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

res_100k_0402.substitution_notes: Standard value — any R equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

qwiic_connector.ipc610_notes: JST-SH 4-pin 1.0mm pitch, SMD horizontal. Qwiic/STEMMA QT pinout: GND, VCC(3.3V), SDA, SCL. Polarized and keyed — cannot be inserted backwards. Allows daisy-chaining external I2C sensors via standard Qwiic cables. Auto-add when any I2C device is on the BOM — gives user expandability. Cable: standard 100mm/200mm Qwiic cable (JST-SH to JST-SH).

pins.notes: Standard 2.54mm pitch header. Pin assignment depends on connected module.

grove_connector.ipc610_notes: JST-PH 4-pin 2.0mm pitch. Grove standard pinout varies by type: I2C (SCL/SDA/VCC/GND), Digital (D0/D1/VCC/GND), Analog (A0/A1/VCC/GND). Larger than Qwiic but more robust for beginners. Used by Seeed, M5Stack ecosystems. Cable: standard Grove 4-pin cable.

pins.notes: Standard 2.54mm pitch header. Pin assignment depends on connected module.

screw_terminal_5pin.ipc610_notes: 5-pin 5.08mm pitch screw terminal. RS-422: TX+, TX-, RX+, RX-, GND. Full duplex differential pairs. Cable: user provides 2x twisted pair + ground (Cat5e works well). Also usable for load cell (E+/E-/S+/S-/GND).

pins.notes: Screw terminal. Wire gauge: 12-22 AWG depending on terminal rating.

uart_header_4pin.ipc610_notes: Standard 4-pin 2.54mm header. Pinout: VCC, TX, RX, GND (FTDI-compatible order). For connecting FTDI/CH340 USB-UART cables for debug or MCUs without USB. Also breakout for mmWave modules (LD2410C) and external UART devices. Cable: FTDI TTL-232R-3V3 or generic USB-UART cable.

pins.notes: Standard 2.54mm pitch header. Pin assignment depends on connected module.

gps_antenna_sma.ipc610_notes: SMA edge-mount female. For GPS active antenna. NEO-6M provides 3.3V antenna supply via VCC_RF pin — route to SMA center pin through inductor (47nH) for DC bias. Active antenna draws ~15mA. Cable: any GPS active antenna with SMA male connector (magnetic puck or patch antenna). Place at board edge, ground plane cutout under connector.

pins.notes: 50Ω impedance. Maintain controlled impedance trace to antenna/module.

motor_screw_terminal.ipc610_notes: 2-pin 5.08mm screw terminal for motor output. Place one per motor channel. DRV8833: 2x for dual H-bridge (OUT1/OUT2 and OUT3/OUT4). DRV8825: 1x for stepper coil A, 1x for coil B. Relay: 1x for switched load. Accepts 24-12AWG motor wire. Add flyback diode for inductive loads if not in driver IC.

pins.notes: Screw terminal. Wire gauge: 12-22 AWG depending on terminal rating.

servo_connector_3pin.ipc610_notes: 3-pin 2.54mm header. Standard servo pinout: GND (brown/black), VCC (red), SIGNAL (orange/white). VCC is servo power (5-6V) — should come from separate regulator or direct battery, NOT the 3.3V logic rail. Signal is MCU PWM GPIO (3.3V is sufficient for most servos). Add 100uF bulk cap near connector for servo current spikes. Cable: standard servo extension cable.

pins.notes: Standard 2.54mm pitch header. Pin assignment depends on connected module.

led_strip_connector.ipc610_notes: 3-pin header for addressable LED strip (WS2812B, SK6812, APA102). Pinout: 5V, DATA, GND. DATA line needs 330R series resistor between MCU GPIO and connector (signal integrity). Add 1000uF bulk capacitor near connector for strip power. 5V supply must be external for long strips (60mA per LED). Route power traces wide (min 1mm per amp). Cable: user provides JST-SM pigtail or direct solder.
safety_warnings: LED strip power: 60mA per LED — 60-LED strip draws 3.6A at 5V (18W)
PCB power trace must be rated for expected current (min 2mm width for 3A)
External 5V power supply recommended for strips longer than 30 LEDs
Do not power long strips through PCB — inject power at strip end

pins.notes: Polarised LED. Cathode marked on package.

mmwave_header_5pin.ipc610_notes: 5-pin header for HLK-LD2410C/LD2412 mmWave module. Pinout: VCC(5V), GND, TX, RX, OUT(GPIO presence output). Module plugs directly onto header. Place at board edge with clear line-of-sight — mmWave radiates through the module face. Keep 10mm antenna keepout zone. Cable: none needed, module is direct plug-in.

pins.notes: Standard 2.54mm pitch header. Pin assignment depends on connected module.

load_cell_connector.ipc610_notes: JST-PH 4-pin for Wheatstone bridge load cell. Pinout: E+ (Excitation+/Red), E- (Excitation-/Black), S+ (Signal+/White), S- (Signal-/Green). Wire colours are typical for most load cells but verify with datasheet. Connects to HX711 channel A (or B). Cable: load cell comes with pre-wired leads.

pins.notes: Standard 2.54mm pitch header. Pin assignment depends on connected module.

soil_probe_connector.ipc610_notes: 3-pin header for capacitive soil moisture probe. Pinout: VCC, GND, ANALOG_OUT. Probe outputs analog voltage proportional to soil moisture. Connect to ADC input (MCU or ADS1115). Power probe from GPIO pin to enable power-gating (saves battery between readings). Cable: probe comes with 3-wire lead.

pins.notes: Standard 2.54mm pitch header. Pin assignment depends on connected module.

output_0_10v_terminal.ipc610_notes: 2-pin 5.08mm screw terminal for 0-10V analog output. Signal from LM358 op-amp gain stage. 10V rail requires either 12V input supply or boost converter. Cable: user provides 2-wire to building automation controller or HVAC damper actuator.

pins.notes: Screw terminal. Wire gauge: 12-22 AWG depending on terminal rating.

cap_1000uf_electrolytic.ipc610_notes: SMD aluminum electrolytic. 1000uF 16V. Bulk decoupling for LED strips (absorbs inrush current). Also useful for servo power rails. Place within 20mm of power connector. Observe polarity marking. Auto-add with led_strip or multiple servos.
safety_warnings: Observe polarity — reversed electrolytic can explode

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

cap_1000uf_electrolytic.substitution_notes: Standard value — any CP equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

hlk_pm01.ipc610_notes: Encapsulated AC-DC converter. 100-240VAC input → 5V 600mA DC output. SAFETY CRITICAL: Mains-rated module with internal isolation. PCB must have >6mm creepage between AC and DC sides. AC input via 2-pin screw terminal with fuse. Requires proper enclosure. UL/CE certified module. For permanent installations (smart home switches, in-wall sensors). Pair with AMS1117 for 3.3V rail.
hlk_pm01.user_cable_note: MAINS VOLTAGE — must be installed by qualified electrician in appropriate enclosure. AC input wired to building mains via fused spur or junction box. No exposed connections.
safety_warnings: MAINS VOLTAGE — risk of electric shock and death
Maintain 8mm minimum creepage between mains input and low-voltage output traces
Use board slots/cutouts to enforce isolation boundary
MUST be enclosed — no exposed mains connections in final product
Requires mains fuse upstream (5x20mm fuse holder)
Installation by qualified electrician only
Not suitable for safety-critical or life-support applications

power.name: AC_L
power.note: MAINS VOLTAGE — connects to fused Live via fuse_holder_5x20

output.note: 5V DC output, 600mA max. Galvanically isolated from mains input. Safe to connect to SELV GND.

pins.notes: MAINS INPUT — maintain 8mm creepage to all low-voltage traces. Board slot between pins 1-2 and pins 3-4. Fuse on AC_L input (auto-added).

hlk_pm01.auto_add_note: Mains power module. Auto-adds fuse holder (in series with Live), MOV varistor (surge protection across L-N), and mains screw terminal. Triggers mains_safety_rules.json for layout constraints.

res_20k_0402.ipc610_notes: 0402 20k 5%. Voltage divider for HC-SR04 echo (5V→3.3V): 10k series + 20k to GND = 3.33V at MCU GPIO. Also general purpose.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

res_20k_0402.substitution_notes: Standard value — any R equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

fiducial_mark.ipc610_notes: 1mm copper dot with 2mm solder mask opening. Pick-and-place machine uses these for board alignment. Place 3x minimum: two on diagonal corners + one on third corner for rotation reference. Keep 5mm from board edge. No solder paste. Zero BOM cost — just copper artwork. JLCPCB requires these for SMT assembly orders.

pins.notes: Non-polarised. Either orientation.

cap_10uf_0805_rail.ipc610_notes: 0805 10uF X5R ceramic. Bulk decoupling on 3.3V power rail — place near LDO/regulator output. Complements per-IC 100nF decoupling. Also place one on 5V rail if present. Auto-add: one per power rail.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

cap_10uf_0805_rail.substitution_notes: Standard value — any C equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

cap_47uf_input.ipc610_notes: SMD aluminum electrolytic. 47uF 25V. Input bulk capacitor — place AFTER regulator/charger input, NOT directly on USB VBUS (would violate USB inrush spec). For barrel jack: place after Schottky + fuse. For USB: place after TP4056 or LDO input. For battery: place on battery output rail. Absorbs transients and provides local energy storage.
safety_warnings: Observe polarity — reversed electrolytic can explode
Do not place directly on USB VBUS

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

cap_47uf_input.substitution_notes: Standard value — any CP equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

schottky_ss34.ipc610_notes: SMA package Schottky diode. 3A, 40V, 0.5V forward drop. Place in series on barrel jack positive input — prevents reverse polarity from reaching the board. 0.5V drop means 12V in → 11.5V to regulator (acceptable). For lower drop, use P-FET reverse protection (AO3401A) but Schottky is simpler and more reliable. Auto-add with barrel jack power.

pins.notes: Polarised. Cathode marked with band on package.

res_2k_0402.ipc610_notes: 0402 2k. Part of 1k+2k voltage divider for 5V→3.3V level shifting. HC-SR04 ECHO pin (5V output) → divider → 3.3V MCU GPIO. Pair with 1k (res_1k_0402) to form divider. Simpler and cheaper than active level shifter for unidirectional signals. Auto-add with 5V sensor inputs.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

res_2k_0402.substitution_notes: Standard value — any R equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

charge_led_red.ipc610_notes: 0402 red LED. TP4056 CHRG pin drives this (active low = charging). 1k series resistor. Place next to power LED. User sees red=charging, off=not charging. Pairs with green charge-complete LED on STDBY pin. Auto-add with TP4056 LiPo charger.

pins.notes: Polarised LED. Cathode marked on package.

ferrite_bead_600r.ipc610_notes: 0805 ferrite bead, 600Ω at 100MHz, 500mA rated. Place on USB VBUS between connector and PTC fuse. Filters high-frequency noise from USB host. Also useful between analog and digital ground planes. Standard practice for USB compliance. Auto-add with USB.

pins.notes: Non-polarised. Either orientation.

gpio_breakout_header.ipc610_notes: 2x10 pin header (20 pins). Breaks out all unused MCU GPIOs + power (3.3V, 5V, GND). Allows breadboard expansion and prototyping. Pin mapping is MCU-specific — resolver assigns based on which GPIOs are still available after other peripherals are routed. Include silkscreen pin labels. Place along board edge for breadboard access. Auto-add for every design — gives the board future-proofing.

pins.notes: Standard 2.54mm pitch header. Pin assignment depends on connected module.

inductor_2n2_0402.ipc610_notes: 0402 2.2nH RF inductor. Part of antenna matching pi-network. ESP32: series inductor between RF pin and PCB trace antenna. Value depends on PCB stackup and antenna design — 2.2nH is typical starting point, tune with VNA. Place within 2mm of RF pin. Use 0402 for low parasitic capacitance. Auto-add with ESP32/nRF52840.

pins.notes: Non-polarised. Either orientation.

cap_1pf_0402.ipc610_notes: 0402 1pF C0G. Antenna matching shunt capacitor. Part of pi-network between RF pin and antenna. C0G/NP0 mandatory for RF — no DC bias derating, no microphonics. Value is starting point — tune with VNA for target VSWR < 2:1. Auto-add with ESP32/nRF52840.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

cap_1pf_0402.substitution_notes: Standard value — any C equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

diode_1n4148w.ipc610_notes: SOD-123 fast switching diode. MANDATORY flyback protection across relay coils and solenoids. Place in reverse-bias across inductive load (cathode to V+, anode to drain/collector). Without this, back-EMF from relay coil deactivation will destroy the driving MOSFET/transistor. Also use across DC motor terminals if no integrated protection in driver. 75V 150mA — sufficient for small relays. For larger relays use SS14 Schottky. Auto-add with relay or solenoid.

pins.notes: Polarised. Cathode marked with band on package.

cmc_usb.ipc610_notes: SMD common-mode choke for USB D+/D-. 90Ω impedance at 100MHz. Suppresses common-mode noise on USB data lines without affecting differential signal. Place between USB connector (after ESD protection) and MCU/USB-UART IC. Low DC resistance (<0.5Ω) — no signal degradation. Standard practice for USB 2.0 EMC compliance. Auto-add with USB.

pins.notes: Common-mode choke. L1 and L2 are the differential pair. Signal flows IN→OUT on each line.

cmc_industrial.ipc610_notes: SMD 1210 common-mode choke. 100µH, 200mA rated. For RS-485 A/B lines and CAN bus CANH/CANL. Place between transceiver and screw terminal connector. Suppresses common-mode noise picked up on long cable runs (RS-485 up to 1200m). Does not affect differential signal. Essential for IEC 61000-4-6 conducted immunity compliance. Auto-add with RS-485 or CAN bus.

pins.notes: Common-mode choke. L1 and L2 are the differential pair. Signal flows IN→OUT on each line.

cap_100uf_cellular.ipc610_notes: SMD aluminum electrolytic 100uF 10V. MANDATORY local bulk capacitor for SIM7080G cellular module. During TX bursts the module draws 2A peaks for 577µs — without local energy storage the supply voltage droops, causing resets and failed transmissions. Place within 10mm of SIM7080G VBAT pin. Supplement with 2x 22uF MLCC in parallel for fast transient response. Auto-add with cellular (NB-IoT/LTE-M).
safety_warnings: Observe polarity — reversed electrolytic can explode

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

cap_100uf_cellular.substitution_notes: Standard value — any CP equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

ferrite_bead_motor.ipc610_notes: 1206 ferrite bead, 120Ω at 100MHz, 2A rated. Place between motor power supply and logic power supply to isolate motor switching noise from MCU and sensitive analog circuits. Higher current rating (2A) needed for motor loads. Also add 100nF + 10uF on logic side after ferrite. Auto-add with motor drivers.

pins.notes: Non-polarised. Either orientation.

tpd4e05u06.ipc610_notes: USON-6 ultra-small 4-channel ESD protection. 5.5V clamp, 0.5pF per line. Place on Qwiic/STEMMA QT connector pins (SDA, SCL, VCC, GND) — protects I2C bus from ESD when external cables connected. Also usable on any 4 exposed GPIO pins. Low capacitance safe for I2C up to 1MHz. IEC 61000-4-2 Level 4 (±15kV air, ±8kV contact). Auto-add with Qwiic connector.

pins.notes: Polarised. Cathode marked with band on package.

res_10r_0402.ipc610_notes: 0402 10R 5%. Snubber resistor — pairs with 100nF cap (RC snubber) across switching regulator output or relay contacts. Damps ringing and reduces EMI from fast switching edges. Place close to noise source. Auto-add with switching regulators and relays.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

res_10r_0402.substitution_notes: Standard value — any R equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

cap_100nf_snubber.ipc610_notes: 0402 100nF X7R. Snubber capacitor — pairs with 10R resistor as RC snubber. Place across switching node to ground (switching regulators) or across relay contacts (contact arc suppression). Reduces EMI from ringing. Auto-add with switching regulators and relays.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

cap_100nf_snubber.substitution_notes: Standard value — any C equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

ferrite_bead_power.ipc610_notes: 0805 ferrite bead, 600Ω at 100MHz, 500mA. Power domain isolation — place between switching regulator output and analog power rail (AVDD). Prevents high-frequency switching noise from reaching ADC, sensors, and RF circuits. Follow with 10uF + 100nF on analog side. Only needed when board has both switching power AND analog/RF circuits. Auto-add when ADC or RF present with switching regulator.

pins.notes: Non-polarised. Either orientation.

cap_10nf_relay_snubber.ipc610_notes: 0805 10nF 250V X7R. Relay contact arc snubber — place in series with 100R resistor across relay COM-NO contacts. Suppresses arcing when switching inductive loads (motors, solenoids, transformers). 250V rating for mains-switching relays. Without snubber, relay contacts erode rapidly and generate massive EMI. Auto-add with relay.
safety_warnings: If switching mains voltage: maintain 8mm creepage between relay contacts and logic traces
Use mains-rated relay (min 250VAC contact rating) for mains switching
Mains relay traces must be reinforced copper width (min 2mm for 10A)
Board must be enclosed — no exposed mains-voltage screw terminals
Flyback diode across coil is MANDATORY (auto-added)
Contact snubber RC recommended for inductive loads (auto-added)

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

cap_10nf_relay_snubber.substitution_notes: Standard value — any C equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

res_100r_0805.ipc610_notes: 0805 100R 5%. Relay contact snubber resistor — pairs with 10nF 250V cap across relay contacts. Limits inrush current through snubber cap. Auto-add with relay.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

res_100r_0805.substitution_notes: Standard value — any R equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

tvs_rs232.ipc610_notes: SOT-23 dual TVS for RS-232 TX/RX protection. Place between DB9 connector and MAX3232 level shifter. RS-232 spec allows ±15V signals — TVS protects against ESD and overvoltage beyond spec. Auto-add with RS-232.

pins.notes: Polarised. Cathode marked with band on package.

ferrite_bead_cellular.ipc610_notes: 1210 ferrite bead, 30Ω at 100MHz, 3A rated. Place on SIM7080G VBAT power supply input. Low impedance at DC (allows 2A TX bursts through) but high impedance at RF frequencies — prevents cellular TX noise from coupling back into the main power supply. Must be high-current rated. Follow with 100uF + 22uF bulk caps on SIM7080G side. Auto-add with cellular.

pins.notes: Non-polarised. Either orientation.

res_5k1_0402.ipc610_notes: 0402 5.1k 1%. MANDATORY USB-C CC pin pull-down resistor. Place 2x: one on CC1, one on CC2, each pulled to GND. This tells the USB-C source "I am a sink device, give me 5V default power." Without these resistors, USB-C PD chargers and most modern USB-C ports will NOT output any voltage — the board appears completely dead. 1% tolerance required by USB-C spec. Place as close to USB-C connector CC pins as possible. Auto-add with EVERY USB-C connector.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

res_5k1_0402.substitution_notes: Standard value — any R equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

res_2k_0805_rprog.ipc610_notes: 0805 2k 5%. TP4056 charge current programming resistor. Connects from PROG (pin 2) to GND. 2k = 580mA charge current — safe for USB 2.0 (500mA max) with margin. Alternative values: 1.2k = 1000mA (USB-C only), 4.7k = 250mA (small cells), 10k = 130mA (coin cells). Resolver selects value based on USB type and battery capacity if known. Auto-add with TP4056.

pins.notes: Non-polarised passive. Either orientation.

res_2k_0805_rprog.substitution_notes: Standard value — any R equivalent acceptable. Prefer JLCPCB basic stock for lowest assembly cost.

zener_5v6.ipc610_notes: SOD-123 5.6V Zener diode. Overvoltage clamp on USB VBUS — cathode to VBUS, anode to GND. If VBUS exceeds 5.6V (non-compliant PD charger, voltage spike), Zener conducts and clamps voltage. Combined with PTC fuse upstream: fuse trips under sustained overcurrent from Zener conduction, disconnecting the fault. Protects TP4056 (max 8V input) and all 5V circuitry. Cheap insurance against non-compliant USB-C sources. Auto-add when USB-C powers TP4056.

pins.notes: Polarised. Cathode marked with band on package.

dw01a.ipc610_notes: SOT-23-6. Single-cell LiPo protection IC.
